Text.val: 21.05.2003 RR -> SCR3542 F1 sends help's default topic, if no context is avail.
Check for help on field level
First priority: help on FIELD level -> Call Bookmark
Second priority: help on SCREEN level -> Call Topic
This program will search for the Screen-identifier (SID)
This is the last used variabele witch fieldname contains the string
When this field is located the program will first check if this
variabele contains a value (this is when the SID is set manually)
If this is true, the value of this field is used as SID
Else the system will filter the SID from the fieldname
IF field contents is NOT empty -> SID = Field contents
